statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments
SELECT adjustment_id, product_id, adjustment_type, market_demand, competition FROM pricing_adjustments
SELECT adjustment_id, product_id, adjustment_type FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand > 0.5
SELECT product_id, adjustment_type, market_demand FROM pricing_adjustments ORDER BY market_demand DESC
SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE competition < 0.3
SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand > 0.5 ORDER BY competition DESC, product_id ASC
SELECT adjustment_id, adjustment_type FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE competition < 0.3 ORDER BY market_demand DESC
SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 AND competition > 0.4 ORDER BY adjustment_id
SELECT product_id, adjustment_type FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand = 0.8 ORDER BY adjustment_type
SELECT adjustment_id, market_demand, competition FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE adjustment_type LIKE '%discount%' ORDER BY adjustment_id ASC
SELECT * FROM market_demand;
SELECT product_id, demand_factor FROM market_demand WHERE demand_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM competition ORDER BY competitor_id DESC;
SELECT competitor_id, pricing_strategy FROM competition WHERE pricing_strategy IN ('Low Price', 'High Price');
SELECT product_id, demand_factor FROM market_demand WHERE demand_factor < 0.5 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_demand WHERE demand_factor > 0.5;
SELECT product_id, demand_factor FROM market_demand ORDER BY demand_factor DESC;
SELECT * FROM competition WHERE competitor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, demand_factor FROM market_demand WHERE demand_factor BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;
SELECT competitor_id, pricing_strategy FROM competition ORDER BY competitor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments;
SELECT id, product_id, market_demand FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand > 100;
SELECT competitor_name, market_share FROM competitors ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, base_price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT product_name, base_price FROM products WHERE base_price < 50 ORDER BY base_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, base_price, category FROM products WHERE base_price > 100 ORDER BY category DESC, base_price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT competitor_name, market_share FROM competitors WHERE market_share < 0.5 ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE market_demand > 50 AND competition_level < 3;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Appliances') ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT pricing_adjustments.id, pricing_adjustments.product_id, products.product_name FROM pricing_adjustments INNER JOIN products ON pricing_adjustments.product_id = products.product_id WHERE pricing_adjustments.market_demand > 70;
SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments;
SELECT product_id, adjustment_type FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE adjustment_value > 0;
SELECT id, demand_level, market_share FROM market_demand ORDER BY demand_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM competition WHERE competitors > 5 ORDER BY competitive_ranking ASC;
SELECT industry_category, subscription_price FROM saas_industry WHERE subscription_price >= 50;
SELECT * FROM pricing_adjustments ORDER BY adjustment_value DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM market_demand GROUP BY product_id HAVING product_count > 2;

SELECT saas_industry.industry_category, saas_industry.subscription_price, competition.competitive_ranking FROM saas_industry JOIN competition ON saas_industry.product_id = competition.product_id WHERE saas_industry.subscription_price < 100;
SELECT MAX(market_demand.market_share) AS max_market_share, AVG(pricing_adjustments.adjustment_value) AS avg_adjustment_value FROM market_demand CROSS JOIN pricing_adjustments;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM pricing_adjustments WHERE adjustment_type = 'discount';
SELECT * FROM dynamic_pricing;
SELECT product_name, base_price FROM dynamic_pricing ORDER BY base_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium';
SELECT competitor_name, products_offered FROM competition ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT demand_date, daily_demand FROM market_demand WHERE daily_demand > 1000;
SELECT * FROM dynamic_pricing WHERE demand_factor > 1.5 ORDER BY base_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, base_price, competition_factor FROM dynamic_pricing WHERE base_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, subscription_plan FROM customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Gold' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT competitor_name, products_offered FROM competition WHERE LENGTH(products_offered) > 50 ORDER BY competitor_name;
SELECT demand_date, daily_demand FROM market_demand WHERE demand_date >= '2022-01-01' AND daily_demand < 1000 ORDER BY demand_date DESC LIMIT 5;
